title: Azure WAF Reliability Checklist
description: Azure Well-Architected Framework checklist for the Reliability pillar.

items.title: Focus your workload design on simplicity and efficiency
items.description: Use a practical approach to avoid unnecessary complexity while meeting your business goals and requirements.

guidance.recommendation: Focus your workload design on simplicity and efficiency. Use a practical approach to avoid unnecessary complexity while meeting your business goals and requirements.

items.title: Identify and rate user and system flows
items.description: Use a criticality scale based on your business requirements to prioritize the flows.

guidance.recommendation: Identify and rate user and system flows. Use a criticality scale based on your business requirements to prioritize the flows.

items.title: Use failure mode analysis (FMA) to identify potential failures in your workload
items.description: Identify dependencies and failure points, and develop mitigation strategies for those failures.

guidance.recommendation: Use failure mode analysis (FMA) to identify potential failures in your workload. Identify dependencies and failure points, and develop mitigation strategies for those failures.

items.title: Define reliability and recovery targets
items.description: for your workload. Use the targets to inform your design and as the foundation of your health model.

guidance.recommendation: Define reliability and recovery targets for your workload. Use the targets to inform your design and as the foundation of your health model.

items.title: Add redundancy at different levels, especially for critical flows
items.description: , to help meet your reliability targets. Consider redundant infrastructure components such as compute and network, and multiple instances of your solution.

guidance.recommendation: Add redundancy at different levels, especially for critical flows, to help meet your reliability targets. Consider redundant infrastructure components such as compute and network, and multiple instances of your solution.

items.title: Implement a timely and reliable scaling strategy at the application, data, and infrastructure levels
items.description: Base the scaling strategy on actual or predicted usage patterns and minimize manual intervention.

guidance.recommendation: Implement a timely and reliable scaling strategy at the application, data, and infrastructure levels. Base the scaling strategy on actual or predicted usage patterns and minimize manual intervention.

items.title: Strengthen the resiliency of your workload by implementing self-preservation and self-healing measures
items.description: Use built-in features and well-established cloud patterns to help your workload remain functional during and recover from incidents.

guidance.recommendation: Strengthen the resiliency of your workload by implementing self-preservation and self-healing measures. Use built-in features and well-established cloud patterns to help your workload remain functional during and recover from incidents.

items.title: Test for resiliency and availability scenarios by applying the principles of chaos engineering
items.description: Ensure that your graceful degradation implementation and scaling strategies are effective by performing active malfunction and simulated load testing.

guidance.recommendation: Test for resiliency and availability scenarios by applying the principles of chaos engineering. Ensure that your graceful degradation implementation and scaling strategies are effective by performing active malfunction and simulated load testing.

items.title: Implement structured, tested, and documented disaster recovery (DR) plans
items.description: that align with the recovery targets. Plans must cover all components and the system as a whole.

guidance.recommendation: Implement structured, tested, and documented disaster recovery (DR) plans that align with the recovery targets. Plans must cover all components and the system as a whole.

items.title: Measure and model the solution's health signals
items.description: Continuously capture uptime and other reliability data from across the workload and also from individual components and key flows.

guidance.recommendation: Measure and model the solution's health signals. Continuously capture uptime and other reliability data from across the workload and also from individual components and key flows.
